lead_paragraph: Dhananjaya de Silva enhanced his rapidly-growing reputation with an unbeaten 43 as he kept South Africa’s strike bowlers at bay to see Sri Lanka to 181 for seven in their first innings at the end of the second day of the first test on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: De Silva Hits Defiant 43 to Keep Sri Lanka in Contention
headline.main: De Silva Hits Defiant 43 to Keep Sri Lanka in Contention
